Name: Pinball Girlfriend
About the game: This is a pinball game that shoots and scores from an overhead angle. Players can move the shooting angle of the pinball by holding down the mouse and dragging. Numbers, once the number on the block is 0, the block will disappear and the player will get the corresponding score. Players can increase their attack power by eliminating blocks marked with stars. By eliminating blocks with pinballs, players can increase their number of pinballs. Once the building blocks exceed the bottom red line of the player, the game will end. At the end of the game, the player will receive a certain percentage of the points obtained in the game. Before the start of the next game, the player can use the gold coins to purchase corresponding props to enhance the player's strength. Get stars to become stronger! The number of stars obtained in each round will be accumulated, and the attack power will also be accumulated! Accumulate gold coins to buy props to strengthen! Use the right item at the right time to score more points! Finally, according to the number of stars of the player, you can unlock beautiful CG pictures in the gallery!
